author: Michael Gellert, Katharina I. Gries, Chihiro Yada, Fabio Rosciano, Kerstin Volz, Bernhard Roling
title: Grain Boundaries in a Lithium Aluminum Titanium Phosphate-Type Fast Lithium Ion Conducting Glass Ceramic: Microstructure and Nonlinear Ion Transport Properties
journal: The Journal of Physical Chemistry C
